query:
SELECT g.id, u.name, u.email, g.userId, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as num_lojas
FROM gestores g
JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
GROUP BY g.id, u.name, u.email, g.userId
ORDER BY num_lojas DESC;
command:

FROM gestores g
JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
GROUP BY g.id, u.name, u.email, g.userId
ORDER BY num_lojas DESC;
